Celebrate special occasions with a gift that brings both comfort and style to a loved one's home.Product features- 100% spun polyester ensures durability and shape retention- Elegant beige plastic zipper with a sleek metal head- Cover shipped separately from the insert to avoid creasing- Eco-friendly stuffing made from recycled polyester for added volume- Double-sided printing for a versatile decorative touchCare instructions- Remove the pillow cover.
